text: Hai imana vali'o! Alaha tuhanu usa sikara de rahim imatihana vica pavega jihara sapurana rupa vica tuhade hatham ate tuhade barachi'am di pahuca vica hovega. Tam ki alaha samajhe ki kihara bada usa tom binham dekho darada hai. Tam jisa ne usa tom ba'ada zulama kita tam usa la'i pira da'ika saza hai
